title: Romance With A Bear
text:
I know that this isn't probably the best way to go about finding a serious romantic partner, but what's the worst that could happen? I meet a serial killer who preys on handsome teddy bears with big hearts and wind up getting shivved? 

Besides the aforementioned handsomeness and big-heartedness, I am a 57 year old big ol' bear - 6'4" 260 pounds of hairy cuddle oso-ishness. I am no GQ model (obviously) but I think of myself as an enjoyable, (relatively) drama-free regular guy who is looking for someone to date, to cuddle up with and to share a heart-centered, loving life with. I may look big, imposing and dangerous, but I am a puddy tat at heart. 

Often attributed to the poet Maya Angelou, I relate to the phrase "don't make someone a priority who thinks of you only as an option". While I don't want to live in a hermetically-sealed love prison, I am longing for a best friend, a lover and an emergency contact on my dental information card. 

Not to go on endlessly (which may still happen, I can't be sure)...I am looking for a guy my age or younger who has good comic sensibility, is easy going, witty, urbane maybe kind of nerdy, dryly observant, is funny, responsible and looking for romance, partnership, collaboration and cuddling. Did I mention there would be cuddling? Big old bear style pawing? I think of myself as sexually versatile, but I think a healthy sex life has to do with chemistry, communication and spontaneity, not how deep or how often I can ram it in you or you can ram it in me. Since chemistry and magnetism is also judged in the physical, we can only hope that we physically will turn each other on as well. We'll exchange some pictures before we meet to be sure. 

I enjoy typical stuff (I guess): I love going to movies (but stay away from dopey comedies, super hero movies and sequels), theatre, concerts. I like to binge-watch TV shows. I like traveling, visiting friends, playing cards, games, bowling, I am competitive but not maniacally competitive. I suck at video games, but I am always willing to learn. I like the beach and urban outdoor fun stuff. I am an entrepeneur, I dabble in stand-up comedy, writing gay country song lyrics, I run a radio station, I dabble in political activism and I am always looking to be a part of bigger communities that are doing something positive both in my little gay world and in the bigger world as a whole. I don't drink or do drugs, and I don't eat meat, but I don't mind if you drink a little or eat a burger. As long as commitment to a bear sounds juicy to you.

I am looking for someone who I get, who gets me and who I have some common ground with. I want an equal partner who laughs out loud at John Oliver and who gets American pop culture references and who is completely out of the closet. Sorry if that sounds harsh, but my past experiences have led me to making that disclaimer, its 2016 - be out and proud!!!!

Well, if this whole bit of whimsy piques your interest, drop me a line and make me chuckle and intrigue me. Send a picture if you like, I will surely send you one of me. I'd be shocked if I get even one response - but the hopeless romantic in me hopes for the best. 

Did I mention there would be cuddling? I am currently living in Southern California. Looking to live bi-coastally. I visit Florida often.

title: Romance With A Bear
text:
I know that this isn't probably the best way to go about finding a serious romantic partner, but what's the worst that could happen? I meet a serial killer who preys on handsome teddy bears with big hearts and wind up getting shivved? 

Besides the aforementioned handsomeness and big-heartedness, I am a 57 year old big ol' bear - 6'4" 260 pounds of hairy cuddle oso-ishness. I am no GQ model (obviously) but I think of myself as an enjoyable, (relatively) drama-free regular guy who is looking for someone to date, to cuddle up with and to share a heart-centered, loving life with. I may look big, imposing and dangerous, but I am a puddy tat at heart. 

Often attributed to the poet Maya Angelou, I relate to the phrase "don't make someone a priority who thinks of you only as an option". While I don't want to live in a hermetically-sealed love prison, I am longing for a best friend, a lover and an emergency contact on my dental information card. 

Not to go on endlessly (which may still happen, I can't be sure)...I am looking for a guy my age or younger who has good comic sensibility, is easy going, witty, urbane maybe kind of nerdy, dryly observant, is funny, responsible and looking for romance, partnership, collaboration and cuddling. Did I mention there would be cuddling? Big old bear style pawing? I think of myself as sexually versatile, but I think a healthy sex life has to do with chemistry, communication and spontaneity, not how deep or how often I can ram it in you or you can ram it in me. Since chemistry and magnetism is also judged in the physical, we can only hope that we physically will turn each other on as well. We'll exchange some pictures before we meet to be sure. 

I enjoy typical stuff (I guess): I love going to movies (but stay away from dopey comedies, super hero movies and sequels), theatre, concerts. I like to binge-watch TV shows. I like traveling, visiting friends, playing cards, games, bowling, I am competitive but not maniacally competitive. I suck at video games, but I am always willing to learn. I like the beach and urban outdoor fun stuff. I am an entrepeneur, I dabble in stand-up comedy, writing gay country song lyrics, I run a radio station, I dabble in political activism and I am always looking to be a part of bigger communities that are doing something positive both in my little gay world and in the bigger world as a whole. I don't drink or do drugs, and I don't eat meat, but I don't mind if you drink a little or eat a burger. As long as commitment to a bear sounds juicy to you.

I am looking for someone who I get, who gets me and who I have some common ground with. I want an equal partner who laughs out loud at John Oliver and who gets American pop culture references and who is completely out of the closet. Sorry if that sounds harsh, but my past experiences have led me to making that disclaimer, its 2016 - be out and proud!!!!

Well, if this whole bit of whimsy piques your interest, drop me a line and make me chuckle and intrigue me. Send a picture if you like, I will surely send you one of me. I'd be shocked if I get even one response - but the hopeless romantic in me hopes for the best. 

Did I mention there would be cuddling? I am currently living in Southern California. Looking to live bi-coastally. I visit Florida often.

title: JUST A REALLY NICE CANADIAN GUY, LOOKING FOR A REALLY NICE GIRL. !!
text:
Hello Ladies,

First of all, I'd like to introduce myself. My name is John and as my Subject Line says, in the most simplistic fashion, "I'm just a Really Nice Canadian Guy, looking for a Really Nice Girl". I do currently live in Toronto for half a year and the other half in South Florida. I would like to move to Florida permanently because I love the State of Florida and in particular, Southern Florida. To be honest I am a very kind, caring and a very, very romantic gentleman. I am a single Man and currently do not have a Girlfriend for over two and a half years now and have been divorced for 13 years now. I am a true Romantic All I aim for or hope for, is to meet a Nice Girl or Woman who is kind, caring, compassionate, attractive and has a good heart. I for some reason cannot find that in Toronto or all of Canada and also I have a very unique liking for American Women as apposed to Canadian Women. I have asked myself many times, "This cannot be that Complicated", or is it just that society projects or dictates these highest and ridiculous standards for everyone. It seems at times, totally out of reach to climb for or ask for. Please don't misunderstand myself that we should lower our standards but merely have a much more open mind to so much beauty a person can offer in so many different ways. After all, we are all humans and there is always someone for someone. Like, how perfect does the woman and date have to be? Let's be real, we all are not perfect and I include myself in that as well.

What ever happened to actually courting a woman, because I am not the kind of guy that needs and wants one night stands or Hook Ups. There has to be more substance, than just sex when dating. Please don't misunderstand me, however I'm a pretty modern guy who lives in the year 2015, but I treasure my old fashioned values, in a modern world and I don't ever want to change that. I truly believe that a woman should be courted or dated with the utmost respect, as it should be. I like to treat a Woman as a True Lady, as it should be that way, in my opinion. It doesn't have to be as formal as it may sound here, the way I am writing this post, but are we loosing something precious in the dating area with everything being on quick express and probably, way too fast, I think anyways.

I'm a Guy that will always want to remember, with great anticipation that "First Kiss" with that special Woman I'm dating and it doesn't even have to be the first date. I just get the feeling that most men are out for 1 thing and I don't agree with that at all. Mind you I know there are good ones out there as well, but hard to find though. When dating there are so many incredible wonders such as, the way she looks, the ways she talks, the way she moves, her beautiful eyes, her gorgeous lips to stare at, the way she dresses, the way she carries herself, does she have poise, the color of her beautiful hair and eyes, the way she twinkles her nose when she appears a little nervous, just to watch across a candle lit dinner and be Proud and Privileged to be so Lucky to have this Lady on a Date for an Evening and who knows, lighting just may strike, when we least expect it to. I should also mention I am looking for a LTR and a possible Serious Relationship. Wanting to find "The One", I've been waiting for for a lifetime, far all too long....

There are so many wonderful things about dating, I feel we as a society are loosing slowly, in my opinion anyways and we are loosing sight of the best and simplest things to appreciate when dating. I wish we could all slow down and appreciate the incredible wonders that we seem to be loosing in our society. That's just how I see it at times. To appreciate and to be thankful for every moment I can enjoy with my Date and Potential Life Partner. Now that's what I call quality. But once again, that's only my own opinion.

What happened to Morals, Values and Principles in regards to Dating and the Opposite Sex as a Woman. I don't want you to think I am a complete square, because I'm certainly not at all, but we all need some Moral Code to live by and stick with, wouldn't you think? I know, I do need that and I'm not going to change that, ever. It's all about Mutual Respect for a Man and a Woman. I'm not suggesting that sex should not be allowed at all or even close, but certain respectable boundaries should be there or I'd like to believe they're still there. That's what I believe in. Taking your time, dating as you can always date the second, third time, etc. So what's the hurry? No hurries, No worries..:) 

Enough said now. If you are looking to date a man as myself, with 2 feet on the ground, always with his head pointed upwards in optimism and has respect for women, who is intelligent, insightful and is very good hearted, enormously romantic and affectionate, emotionally available, very kind, caring, compassionate, very sincere, passionate, sensual and I don't want to sit here and brag about myself, but I am a solid man, who will always adhere to what I believe to be the right thing to do and how to behave decently around any woman and always keep my standards high, towards treating a woman properly and respectfully.

If you are looking for such a man, a handsome man, a man with dignity and respect towards others and himself, I would be so delighted to hear from you. You don't have to be perfect to date and to date myself, as I also find imperfections enormously sexy, at times as well. A good balance is the key, I think anyways and most certainly a good sense of humor and lots of laughter and fun and truly enjoying each others company. Sounds pretty simple to me, don't you think? After all, we only have the present to enjoy to the fullest. I am not far from you and only a 3 hour flight, that's all...:)

If you have read my post until here and got the correct message I am trying to convey, I would just love to hear from you, very much so. I am looking to date a woman between the ages of 30ish to 55ish, but I am open to everyone to respond, of any age, creed and color, literally. I do thank you so, so very much for reading this lengthy yet very sincere and genuine post and hanging in there Ladies. I know it as a long read, not intentionally though...:)


Very Sincerely & Genuinely,


John ....:)


P.S. Please and Kindly put the word "DECENT" in the Subject Heading when replying, so I can avoid spammers and bots. Thank You Again.

P.S.S. If in the event you do have a picture of yourself, I would love to see it and you will 100% definitely get my picture in return, absolutely. If not maybe you could get my curiosity with a very brief description of yourself then. Thank You For Your Understanding. You don't have to be perfect, remember?

Thank You Very Much, Ladies for Reading My Post & Have a Very Pleasant Day or Evening.
